author: Simon Difford
description: The bittersweet herbal notes from the vermouth and Cynar combine harmoniously with the cachaça. Depending on how punchy you like your cocktails you may want to increase or decrease the amount of cachaça (anywhere between 45 and 60ml).
name: Rabo-de-Galo
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: THROW OR STIR (or even shake) all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass

video.description: The bittersweet herbal notes from the vermouth and Cynar combine harmoniously with the cachaça. Depending on how punchy you like your cocktails you may want to increase or decrease the amount of cachaça (anywhere between 45 and 60ml).
video.name: HOWTO make Rabo-de-Galo
